entry.title: ROSEBURG WEEKEND RAIN DATA
entry.summary: December 4, 2023 4:20 a.m. It was a rainy weekend in Roseburg with Sunday being the wetter day. Data from the National Weather Service said from 12:00 a.m. Saturday to 12:00 a.m. Monday 1.1 inches or rain was reported at the Roseburg Regional Airport. Saturday Roseburg received .41 inches of rain while Sunday had .69...

entry.title: FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
entry.summary: December 4, 2023 4:10 a.m. A Flood Watch is in effect through Wednesday afternoon for much of the region. Forecasters at the National Weather Service said flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. The Watch area is for central Douglas County, Josephine County, and Curry County and includes Myrtle Point, Coquille and Scottsburg. It applies...

entry.title: FOREST SERVICE HAVING WORK PARTIES ON THE NORTH UMPQUA
entry.summary: December 4, 2023 3:30 a.m. The Umpqua National Forest is having work parties on the North Umpqua Trail this month. entry.title: FLOOD POTENTIAL OUTLOOK FOR RIVERS IN REGION
entry.summary: December 3, 2023 6:00 a.m. The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Potential Outlook for quick rises on rivers and streams in Douglas, Coos, and Curry counties. entry.title: Roseburg church to open its doors as cold weather shelter
entry.summary: It looks like unhoused individuals will have a place to get out of the cold this winter, and possibly for years to come, following the announcement that an extreme weather shelter will open on the campus of a Roseburg church.

entry.title: County Commissioners approve of contract to patch Douglas County Museum roof
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Douglas County Commissioners approved a contract with Pressure Point Roofing, Inc., during Wednesday's regular meeting, to install an overlay roofing at the Douglas County Museum Building for $82,437.

entry.title: Douglas County approves of contract with Verizon Wireless to replace tower
entry.summary: YONCALLA — A Verizon Wireless service tower in Yoncalla will be replaced, after Douglas County Commissioners signed off on a contract during Wednesday's weekly board meeting.

entry.title: Online cooking course for young adults experiencing disabilities, nonprofit program
entry.summary: Reality Kitchen Nonprofit is making customer service and cooking skills a reality for young adults experiencing intellectual and developmental disabilities. Soon, its in-person curriculum will expand online to reach rural communities.
